explains: adj. 反常的，异常的，变态的；不规则的
wordGroup: abnormal behavior 异常行为；变态行为
abnormal sound 不正常声音；杂音

sentences.en: They thought his behaviour was abnormal.
He concluded that Oswald was somewhat abnormal.
sentences.cn: 他断定奥斯瓦德有点不正常。

sentences.en: The abnormal bleeding is your body's own red flag of danger.
sentences.cn: 这反常的流血是你身体本身的危险信号。
